net.blitzcube.peapi.api.entity.fake

Interface IFakeEntityFactory


  • public interface IFakeEntityFactory
    Since:
    2018-04-23
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Detail

      • createHitboxFromType

        IHitbox createHitboxFromType(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Create a hitbox that matches the hitbox of a given entity type. This will use reflection to pull from NMS if the value has not been calculated already.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity to match the hitbox to
        Returns:
        the generated hitbox, or null if it could not be produced.

      • createHitbox

        IHitbox createHitbox(org.bukkit.util.Vector min,
                     org.bukkit.util.Vector max)
        Create a hitbox using a minimum and maximum Vector. The origin should be considered to be at the center of the entity's feet.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum XYZ vector
        max - the maximum XYZ vector
        Returns:
        the generated hitbox

      • createFakeEntity

        IFakeEntity createFakeEntity(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Creates a fake entity of the given type. By default, this does NOT include the modifiers. The metadata of the entity will not be pre-populated with the default values. To do this, use createFakeEntity(EntityType, boolean). This fake entity will be pre-populated with a hitbox generated by createHitboxFromType(EntityType). It will also be given an entity ID and unique ID.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity that should be created
        Returns:
        the generated fake entity

      • createFakeEntity

        IFakeEntity createFakeEntity(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type,
                             boolean lookupModifiers)
        Creates a fake entity of the given type. If desired, this method can also populate a map containing the possible entity metadata values for this entity type. This fake entity will be pre-populated with a hitbox generated by createHitboxFromType(EntityType). It will also be given an entity ID and unique ID.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity that should be created
        lookupModifiers - whether or not to pre-populate the metadata field map
        Returns:
        the generated fake entity

      • isFakeEntity

        boolean isFakeEntity(int entityID)
        Returns true if the entity ID given belongs to a fake entity produced by this factory.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to check
        Returns:
        whether or not the entity is fake

      • getFakeByID

        IFakeEntity getFakeByID(int entityID)
        Gets a IFakeEntity object by its entity ID.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to retrieve
        Returns:
        the retrieved fake entity object.
